name: Gochi-Show!
description:
Polish your cooking skills in real life while playing a game!?

After receiving more than 1 million downloads for the wildly successful Burn Your Fat With Me! series, the new successor in innovative lifestyle games has been decided.

Gochi-Show could be the first of its kind. Cook in real life to progress the game's story. 

It's innovative and fun! Cooking will never be the same again!
